focus_recommendations: 🎯 Focus on center of document, not edges or background

Very low edge content - possible motion blur or extreme defocus

🎯 Ensure proper distance - too close causes focus issues
📱 Use tripod or stable surface to reduce camera shake
⚡ Use faster shutter speed or better stabilization
